name: 灾厄MOD
description:
Lanzou提取码: afcp
本灾厄Mod版本为1.4.3.2，(应该)是灾厄Mod适配(移植版)0.11.6.2的实际最高版本，理论来说是1.4.4.4，但是亲测会报错

灾厄模组的内容包括：

超过二十个新的Boss首领
大量的新敌人、物品和矿物
六种全新的地形环境和构造
五种全新的挑战模式
对原版游戏内物品和属性的平衡性调整
一个全新的事件
更多与其他模组联动的内容

请注意：
灾厄模组还有专属音乐包！

name: 灾厄音乐包

灾厄音乐包(Calamity Music Mod)
版本是v1.4.3.1 应该是适配tmodv0.11.6.2的灾厄音乐包的最高版本

name: 这个东西从哪里来
description:
When you look at a modded item, block or NPC, WMITF will show you the name of the mod which it came from.

This can be useful if you're playing with lots of mods at once, or if you're a YouTuber and you want your viewers to see which mods you're using.

(Inspired by the Minecraft mod WAILA by ProfMobius)

Also, big thanks to Pop000100 for maintaining the mod.

name: 拿起武器WeaponOut
description:
WeaponOut is a quality of life and minor content mod that introduces items that use interesting game mechanics balanced for vanilla Terraria,
 but are capable of holding up to modded playthroughs. It adds fist, whips,
 multi-function and team support items as well as ease-of-use functions such as autoswinging accessories,
 teleporting hooks and temporary spawn points.

Summary:
* Hide/Show weapons being held with inventory icon (top left).
* Temporary spawn point tents! Silk + Wood.
* Fists! Dash at enemies to deliver devastating combos.
* Whips! Deals crits when hitting at the tip.
* Sabers! Fast striking swords with special charge effects.
* More dual-use Weapons! Right-click for secondary weapon abilities.
* Early game shields, with situational uses.
* Team-centric items for buffing, and restoring mana.
* Trivial accessories! Scale low tier weapons to high tier.
* Custom config file, if you want to toggle the above features.

Note: Config located in Terraria/ModLoader/Mod Configs

Content:
* 44 Fist Weapons
* 9 Whip Weapons
* 9 Saber Weapons
* Quite a few other weapons
* 25 Accessories (roughly)
* 1 Tile
* 3 Bullets


Now has a wiki page: https://terrariamods.gamepedia.com/WeaponOut
Folks on the discord server - Suggestions, bug testing and all-round support. You guys rock!
kiedev666 - The first playtester.

Mod recommendations:
Virtuous = Adds a whole bunch of cool and unique weapons.
UnuBattleRods = Adds a fishing class that deals damage via special fishing rods that are also weapons.

name: 见血封喉(Antiaris)
writer: Zadum4ivii, Sprywisp, Gouvod, Vikri, Nokilos, CookieSam
description: Lanzou分享提取码: 6kbh Introduction Antiaris is a new project from part of team which made Tremor Mod. We decided to stop developing of Tremor Mod and make a completely new project. Content in Antiaris will be more interesting, balanced and unique, unlike in Tremor, since we decided to go with "Quality > Quantity". Our team will try to make the game bigger, make the player feel more interested in game. Check the thread everyday for more information & spoilers!

name: Archeon
description: Lanzou提取码: fs8v Archeon is being created by a Duo! AndrewIDFK: Started Archeon, also the coder. Siggator: Mostly every sprite and some other things Behind the Scenes. Check out his Youtube Channel, link in the Archeon Home Page. Archeon adds: - Over 120 items! - 1 Boss: The Hallowed One - 9 Enemies - 20 Melee Weapons - 20 Ranged Weapons - 10 Magic Weapons - 5 Summon Weapons - 9 Tools - 6 Ores - 4 Armor sets - 10 Accessories - 5 Potions - 1 Town NPC - 1 Invasion And lots more! Please join our Discord, Link is in the Archeon Forum Thread if you want to give us some ideas and report problems/unbalanced weapons! CHANGELOG: Version 1.1.8.491: - Reverted halloween recolors and particles - Added a poisonous potion: Tantrum! - Changed mod Icon Version 1.1.8.49 (Halloween Update!): - Updated to tModLoader 0.11.5 - Added Jack O' BOOM, Chernobyl's Remains, Soul Reaper and Spirit's Tome (After this month, some of these sprites will change) - Simple re-colors for Upper Charge, Rain Charge and Terruption - Changed some recipes, nerfed and buffed some weapons. - Fixed some problems, lots more left to fix
